channel.title: Projects on Mateus Silva Rocha
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mateus Silva Rocha

item.title: Classifying fetal health
item.description: The central objective of this project is, given a set of data, to know if a fetus is healthy. The label is divided into three classes: healthy, suspicious and pathological, with the pathological being the most serious. To access information about the entire project, access the notebook.

item.title: Classifying covid-related twitter feelings
item.description: The purpose of this project is to classify Twitter texts related to Covid 19 as positive, negative or neutral. The model was also put into production, so anyone who has the link to the application can use it. Project details, access the notebook. Full video explanation, visit the youtube link. Application details, access the repository .

item.title: Classify handwritten digits
item.description: The main objective of this project is to identify which number is written in an image. To increase the performance of the model, data augmentation techniques were used to increase the amount of data for training and testing the machine learning model. For detailed information, access the notebook.

item.title: Predicting House Values ​​in Boston
Predicting the amount of air pollution in Beijing
